meanings.definition: The process by which different kinds of living organisms are thought to have developed and diversified from earlier forms during the history of the earth.
meanings.sent1: The evolution of technology has changed how we communicate.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study evolution to understand how species change over time.
meanings.sent3: The evolution of my messy room into a clean space was a miracle.
meanings.sent4: Her fashion sense has undergone an evolution, transforming from casual to elegant.
meanings.sent5: The evolution of the caterpillar into a butterfly is a beautiful transformation.

meanings.definition: The gradual development of something, especially from a simple to a more complex form.
meanings.sent1: The evolution of a seed into a blooming flower is fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The evolution of a simple idea into a successful business requires hard work.
meanings.sent3: Watching the evolution of a joke from a giggle to a roar of laughter is priceless.
meanings.sent4: The evolution of a student from struggling to excelling is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The evolution of a caterpillar into a butterfly showcases nature's beauty.
